name: soil-cli
description: Soil Cli is a framework for rapidly building ambitious CLI applications with io.js using the ES6 Class Syntax

scripts.lint-staged: git diff --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB --cached --name-only | grep '.*\.js$' | grep -v 'node_modules' | xargs eslint -c .eslintrc --ext .js --ext .js
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run lint

config.notes: important to correct the path of npm so that the git hook doesn't error

ghooks.pre-push: PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:/usr/local/sbin && npm run doctoc && npm run lint && npm test

author: John-Henry Liberty <jhliberty@terminalvelo.city> (http://terminalvelo.city)
